title: Something that riot could do for funsies.
body: give a very small amount of rp to people that didn't get reported at the end of every week that they have played a certain amount of games in. like, 5 rp and 10 games.

replies.body: Hmmm, that might not be bad. People go through enough RP that little bits like that would be useful from time to time, and even if someone devoutly played 10 games a week 52 weeks a year, that's only  260 RP total
